attributes.action: reduce the size of the state and, by extension, reduce taxes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The ever-increasing size and cost of the state is stifling the growth of the private sector, which creates private sector jobs.In this way, more people share the tax burden, which means paying less. 

Either match expenditure with policies that ensure expenditure efficiency, which leads to less waste; or reduce taxes and spend less on wasteful policies such as expenditure on desk-tidying for bureaucrats or the excessive cost of translation - to name but a few.
